sqlMap.sql:
SELECT ROWNUM RN , T1.* FROM( SELECT A.PRJ_ID AS PRJ_ID , B.PRJ_NM AS PRJ_NM , A.AUTH_GRP_ID AS AUTH_TARGET_ID , A.AUTH_GRP_NM AS AUTH_TARGET_NM , TO_CHAR('01') AS AUTH_TYPE_CD , '' AS AUTH_TARGET_IMG_ID , '' AS AUTH_TARGET_EMAIL , '' AS AUTH_TARGET_DEPT_ID , '' AS AUTH_TARGET_DEPT_NM FROM PRJ2000 A LEFT JOIN PRJ1000 B ON (A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = B.LIC_GRP_ID) WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.USE_CD = '01' AND A.PRJ_ID != 'ROOTSYSTEM_PRJ' AND A.PRJ_ID IS NOT NULL
AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId#
UNION
SELECT '' AS PRJ_ID , '' AS PRJ_NM , C.USR_ID AS AUTH_TARGET_ID , C.USR_NM AS AUTH_TARGET_NM , TO_CHAR('02') AS AUTH_TYPE_CD , C.USR_IMG_ID AS AUTH_TARGET_IMG_ID , C.EMAIL AS AUTH_TARGET_EMAIL , C.DEPT_ID AS AUTH_TARGET_DEPT_ID , SF_STM6000_DEPT_NM(#licGrpId#, C.DEPT_ID, '2') AS AUTH_TARGET_DEPT_NM FROM STM3000 C WHERE 1 = 1 AND C.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND C.DEL_CD = '02' ORDER BY AUTH_TYPE_CD ASC, AUTH_TARGET_ID ASC ) T1 WHERE 1 = 1
AND T1.AUTH_TARGET_ID LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND T1.AUTH_TARGET_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND T1.AUTH_TYPE_CD = #searchTargetData#
AND T1.AUTH_TARGET_DEPT_ID = #searchTargetData#
AND T1.AUTH_TARGET_DEPT_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND T1.AUTH_TARGET_EMAIL LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
sqlMap.select:
SELECT C.LIC_GRP_ID AS LIC_GRP_ID , C.MENU_ID AS MENU_ID , C.STM_TYPE_CD AS STM_TYPE_CD , C.STM_TYPE_NM AS STM_TYPE_NM , C.STM_NM AS STM_NM , C.STM_DS_TYPE_CD AS STM_DS_TYPE_CD , C.STM_DS_TYPE_NM AS STM_DS_TYPE_NM , TO_CHAR(COUNT(CASE WHEN C.DEL_CD='01' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END)) AS DEL_CNT , TO_CHAR(COUNT(CASE WHEN C.DEL_CD='02' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END)) AS CNT FROM ( SELECT A.LIC_GRP_ID AS LIC_GRP_ID , A.MENU_ID AS MENU_ID , A.STM_TYPE_CD AS STM_TYPE_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO( #licGrpId#, 'STM00001', A.STM_TYPE_CD, '1') AS STM_TYPE_NM , A.STM_NM AS STM_NM , A.STM_DS_TYPE_CD AS STM_DS_TYPE_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO( #licGrpId#, 'STM00002', A.STM_DS_TYPE_CD, '1') AS STM_DS_TYPE_NM , B.BAD_ID AS BAD_ID , B.DEL_CD AS DEL_CD FROM STM2100 A LEFT JOIN BAD1000 B ON A.LIC_GRP_ID = B.LIC_GRP_ID AND A.MENU_ID = B.MENU_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# ) C WHERE 1 = 1
AND C.STM_TYPE_CD = #searchTargetData#
AND C.STM_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
GROUP BY C.LIC_GRP_ID, C.MENU_ID, C.STM_TYPE_CD, C.STM_TYPE_NM, C.STM_NM, C.STM_DS_TYPE_CD, C.STM_DS_TYPE_NM
ORDER BY $paramSortFieldId$
DESC
ASC
ORDER BY MENU_ID DESC

SELECT A.STM_TYPE_CD AS STM_TYPE_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO( #licGrpId#, 'STM00001', A.STM_TYPE_CD, '1') AS STM_TYPE_NM , A.STM_NM AS STM_NM , A.STM_DS_TYPE_CD AS STM_DS_TYPE_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO( #licGrpId#, 'STM00002', A.STM_DS_TYPE_CD, '1') AS STM_DS_TYPE_NM , A.STM_NTC_YN_CD AS STM_NTC_YN_CD , A.STM_PW_YN_CD AS STM_PW_YN_CD , A.STM_CMT_YN_CD AS STM_CMT_YN_CD , A.STM_TAG_YN_CD AS STM_TAG_YN_CD , A.STM_FILE_CNT AS STM_FILE_CNT , A.STM_FILE_STRG / (1024 * 1024) AS STM_FILE_STRG FROM STM2100 A WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.MENU_ID = #menuId#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE STM2100 SET STM_TYPE_CD = #stmTypeCd# , STM_DS_TYPE_CD = #stmDsTypeCd# , STM_NTC_YN_CD = #stmNtcYnCd# , STM_PW_YN_CD = #stmPwYnCd# , STM_CMT_YN_CD = #stmCmtYnCd# , STM_TAG_YN_CD = #stmTagYnCd# , STM_FILE_CNT = #stmFileCnt# , STM_FILE_STRG = #stmFileStrg# , MODIFY_DTM = sysdate , MODIFY_USR_ID = #modifyUsrId# , MODIFY_USR_IP = #modifyUsrIp# WHERE 1 = 1 AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND MENU_ID = #menuId#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT T1.* FROM ( SELECT A.LIC_GRP_ID AS LIC_GRP_ID , A.MENU_ID AS MENU_ID , A.STM_ADMIN_ID AS AUTH_TARGET_ID , A.STM_ADMIN_CD AS AUTH_TYPE_CD , '' AS AUTH_TARGET_IMG_ID , B.AUTH_GRP_NM AS AUTH_TARGET_NM , '' AS AUTH_TARGET_EMAIL , '' AS AUTH_TARGET_DEPT_NM , '' AS AUTH_TARGET_DEPT_ID , A.PRJ_ID AS PRJ_ID , C.PRJ_NM AS PRJ_NM , A.PRJ_GRP_ID AS PRJ_GRP_ID , D.PRJ_NM AS PRJ_GRP_NM FROM STM2110 A INNER JOIN PRJ2000 B ON ( B.LIC_GRP_ID = A.LIC_GRP_ID AND B.PRJ_ID = A.PRJ_ID AND B.USE_CD = '01' AND A.STM_ADMIN_CD = '01' AND B.AUTH_GRP_ID = A.STM_ADMIN_ID ) LEFT JOIN PRJ1000 C ON( C.PRJ_ID = A.PRJ_ID ) LEFT JOIN PRJ1000 D ON( D.PRJ_ID = A.PRJ_GRP_ID ) AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.MENU_ID = #menuId#
UNION
SELECT E.LIC_GRP_ID AS LIC_GRP_ID , E.MENU_ID AS MENU_ID , E.STM_ADMIN_ID AS AUTH_TARGET_ID , E.STM_ADMIN_CD AS AUTH_TYPE_CD , F.USR_IMG_ID AS AUTH_TARGET_IMG_ID , F.USR_NM AS AUTH_TARGET_NM , F.EMAIL AS AUTH_TARGET_EMAIL , SF_STM6000_DEPT_NM(E.LIC_GRP_ID, F.DEPT_ID, '2') AS AUTH_TARGET_DEPT_NM , F.DEPT_ID AS AUTH_TARGET_DEPT_ID , E.PRJ_ID AS PRJ_ID , G.PRJ_NM AS PRJ_NM , E.PRJ_GRP_ID AS PRJ_GRP_ID , H.PRJ_NM AS PRJ_GRP_NM FROM STM2110 E INNER JOIN STM3000 F ON ( E.STM_ADMIN_CD = '02' AND F.USR_ID = E.STM_ADMIN_ID AND F.USE_CD = '01' AND F.DEL_CD = '02' ) LEFT JOIN PRJ1000 G ON( G.PRJ_ID = E.PRJ_ID ) LEFT JOIN PRJ1000 H ON( H.PRJ_ID = E.PRJ_GRP_ID ) WHERE 1 = 1 AND E.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND E.MENU_ID = #menuId# ) T1 WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY T1.AUTH_TYPE_CD ASC, T1.AUTH_TARGET_ID ASC, T1.AUTH_TARGET_DEPT_NM ASC
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT NVL( SUBSTR(LBL_ID, 1, 11) || LPAD( (TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(LBL_ID, 12, 5)) + 1) , 5, '0') , 'STM' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '00001' ) AS LBL_ID FROM ( SELECT MAX(LBL_ID) AS LBL_ID FROM STM2110 A WHERE 1 = 1 )
INSERT INTO STM2110 ( LIC_GRP_ID , MENU_ID , LBL_ID , STM_ADMIN_CD , STM_ADMIN_ID , PRJ_GRP_ID , PRJ_ID , REG_DTM , REG_USR_ID , REG_USR_IP , MODIFY_DTM , MODIFY_USR_ID , MODIFY_USR_IP ) VALUES ( #licGrpId# , #menuId# , #lblId# , #stmAdminCd# , #stmAdminId# , #prjGrpId# , #prjId# , SYSDATE , #regUsrId# , #regUsrIp# , SYSDATE , #modifyUsrId# , #modifyUsrIp# )
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM STM2110 WHERE 1 = 1 AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND MENU_ID = #menuId#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT T1.* FROM ( SELECT A.LIC_GRP_ID AS LIC_GRP_ID , A.MENU_ID AS MENU_ID , A.STM_WT_ID AS AUTH_TARGET_ID , A.STM_WT_CD AS AUTH_TYPE_CD , '' AS AUTH_TARGET_IMG_ID , B.AUTH_GRP_NM AS AUTH_TARGET_NM , '' AS AUTH_TARGET_EMAIL , '' AS AUTH_TARGET_DEPT_NM , '' AS AUTH_TARGET_DEPT_ID , A.PRJ_ID AS PRJ_ID , C.PRJ_NM AS PRJ_NM , A.PRJ_GRP_ID AS PRJ_GRP_ID , D.PRJ_NM AS PRJ_GRP_NM FROM STM2120 A INNER JOIN PRJ2000 B ON ( B.LIC_GRP_ID = A.LIC_GRP_ID AND B.PRJ_ID = A.PRJ_ID AND B.USE_CD = '01' AND A.STM_WT_CD = '01' AND B.AUTH_GRP_ID = A.STM_WT_ID ) LEFT JOIN PRJ1000 C ON( C.PRJ_ID = A.PRJ_ID ) LEFT JOIN PRJ1000 D ON( D.PRJ_ID = A.PRJ_GRP_ID ) AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.MENU_ID = #menuId#
UNION
SELECT E.LIC_GRP_ID AS LIC_GRP_ID , E.MENU_ID AS MENU_ID , E.STM_WT_ID AS AUTH_TARGET_ID , E.STM_WT_CD AS AUTH_TYPE_CD , F.USR_IMG_ID AS AUTH_TARGET_IMG_ID , F.USR_NM AS AUTH_TARGET_NM , F.EMAIL AS AUTH_TARGET_EMAIL , SF_STM6000_DEPT_NM(E.LIC_GRP_ID, F.DEPT_ID, '2') AS AUTH_TARGET_DEPT_NM , F.DEPT_ID AS AUTH_TARGET_DEPT_ID , E.PRJ_ID AS PRJ_ID , G.PRJ_NM AS PRJ_NM , E.PRJ_GRP_ID AS PRJ_GRP_ID , H.PRJ_NM AS PRJ_GRP_NM FROM STM2120 E INNER JOIN STM3000 F ON ( E.STM_WT_CD = '02' AND F.USR_ID = E.STM_WT_ID AND F.USE_CD = '01' AND F.DEL_CD = '02' ) LEFT JOIN PRJ1000 G ON( G.PRJ_ID = E.PRJ_ID ) LEFT JOIN PRJ1000 H ON( H.PRJ_ID = E.PRJ_GRP_ID ) WHERE 1 = 1 AND E.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND E.MENU_ID = #menuId# ) T1 WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY T1.AUTH_TYPE_CD ASC, T1.AUTH_TARGET_ID ASC, T1.AUTH_TARGET_DEPT_NM ASC
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT NVL( SUBSTR(LBL_ID, 1, 11) || LPAD( (TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(LBL_ID, 12, 5)) + 1) , 5, '0') , 'STM' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '00001' ) AS LBL_ID FROM ( SELECT MAX(LBL_ID) AS LBL_ID FROM STM2120 A WHERE 1 = 1 )
INSERT INTO STM2120 ( LIC_GRP_ID , MENU_ID , LBL_ID , STM_WT_CD , STM_WT_ID , PRJ_GRP_ID , PRJ_ID , REG_DTM , REG_USR_ID , REG_USR_IP , MODIFY_DTM , MODIFY_USR_ID , MODIFY_USR_IP ) VALUES ( #licGrpId# , #menuId# , #lblId# , #stmWtCd# , #stmWtId# , #prjGrpId# , #prjId# , SYSDATE , #regUsrId# , #regUsrIp# , SYSDATE , #modifyUsrId# , #modifyUsrIp# )
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM STM2120 WHERE 1 = 1 AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND MENU_ID = #menuId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT NVL2(A.LBL_ID, 'Y', 'N') AS YN FROM STM2110 A WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.MENU_ID = #menuId# AND ( ( A.STM_ADMIN_CD = '01' AND A.STM_ADMIN_ID = #authGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# ) OR ( A.STM_ADMIN_CD = '02' AND A.STM_ADMIN_ID = #usrId# ) )

SELECT NVL2(A.LBL_ID, 'Y', 'N') AS YN FROM STM2120 A WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.MENU_ID = #menuId# AND ( ( A.STM_WT_CD = '01' AND A.STM_WT_ID = #authGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# ) OR ( A.STM_WT_CD = '02' AND A.STM_WT_ID = #usrId# ) )

SELECT NVL2(E.BAD_WTDTM, E.BAD_WTDTM, E.MODIFY_DTM) AS CHART_DATE , NVL(E.TOTAL_NEW_CNT, 0) AS TOTAL_NEW_CNT , NVL(E.DEL_CNT, 0) AS DEL_CNT FROM( SELECT C.BAD_WTDTM AS BAD_WTDTM , C.TOTAL_NEW_CNT AS TOTAL_NEW_CNT , D.MODIFY_DTM AS MODIFY_DTM , D.DEL_CNT AS DEL_CNT FROM( SELECT TO_CHAR(A.BAD_WTDTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BAD_WTDTM , TO_CHAR(COUNT(A.BAD_ID)) AS TOTAL_NEW_CNT FROM BAD1000 A WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.MENU_ID = #menuId# AND TO_CHAR(A.BAD_WTDTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') GROUP BY TO_CHAR(A.BAD_WTDTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) C FULL OUTER JOIN ( SELECT TO_CHAR(B.MODIFY_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MODIFY_DTM , TO_CHAR(COUNT(B.BAD_ID)) AS DEL_CNT FROM BAD1000 B WHERE 1 = 1 AND B.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND B.MENU_ID = #menuId# AND TO_CHAR(B.MODIFY_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') GROUP BY TO_CHAR(B.MODIFY_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) D ON ( C.BAD_WTDTM = D.MODIFY_DTM ) WHERE 1 = 1 ) E WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY CHART_DATE ASC
